meanings.definition: To stitch together edges of a wound or incision.
meanings.sent1: The doctor carefully sutured the cut on the patient's arm.
meanings.sent2: She sutured the torn fabric back together.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy tailor sutured the sleeve to the wrong side of the shirt!
meanings.sent4: Her words sutured the broken relationship between the two friends.
meanings.sent5: The needle deftly sutured the torn paper, making it whole again.
